title: The Story of a Man Who Is Reincarnated as the Shi*tiest Guy in a Doujin, but the Heroine Keeps on Coming Close to Him - Novel Updates

tags: Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Carefree Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Complex Family Relationships   Couple Growth   Delinquents   Devoted Love Interests   Early Romance   Handsome Male Lead   Hated Protagonist   Living Alone   Loner Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Mismatched Couple   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Obsessive Love   Outcasts   R-15   Reincarnated in Another World   Ruthless Protagonist   S*x Friends   Transmigration

description:
Suddenly I remembered.

This is the world of the adult manga I had originally read, and that I myself am the one who plays the role of the man who steals the heroine away from the protagonist.

I don’t have that kind of taste, so please let the heroine get along with the protagonist.

That’s what should have happened…
So why the hell are they bothering with me?!>
